channel.title: Half Life 2 + Windows 7 = FAILS
channel.description:
Last week I upgraded from XP to Seven and now HL2 is crashing.
The thing is, it crashes only in one situation: the Gman speech at the start.
exactly after he finishes saying [i]"...Not that I wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job"[/i] it gets stuck (repeating "job,job,job") and I have to Ctrl+alt+del to finish the process.
then i opened console and unlocked all chapters (sv_unlockedchapters 20) and started from "A Red Letter Day", and it works like a charm.
I dont know why it is, cause it ran perfectly using windows xp on this same computer, installed from the same dvd.
what could it be? :[

Last week I upgraded from XP to Seven and now HL2 is crashing.

The thing is, it crashes only in one situation: the Gman speech at the start.

exactly after he finishes saying “…Not that I wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job” it gets stuck (repeating “job,job,job”) and I have to Ctrl+alt+del to finish the process.

then i opened console and unlocked all chapters (sv_unlockedchapters 20) and started from “A Red Letter Day”, and it works like a charm.

I dont know why it is, cause it ran perfectly using windows xp on this same computer, installed from the same dvd.

what could it be? :[

hey,i really need your help!
i m struck at the very same problem since last week,searched on google,tried everything,and ultimately reached your thread,which mentioned the same problem as mine…
plz tell me how did you resolved that!!!
i couldnt understand “technical” language you wrote as solution…
plz reply,write as elaborated and simple as possible…

item.title: Half Life 2 + Windows 7 = FAILS
item.dc:creator: nunzilla
item.description:
Spriter-San:

First of all, don’t necropost.

That’s funny, because I’m sure that if he (or she) had come on to the forums and started a new thread, somebody would have responded with something along the lines of:

Douche:

OMFG NO NEW THRED WHEN DERE IS ALREADY 1 USE DA SERCH AND READ FAQ U R NOOB GO AWAY

Give the guy (or gal) some slack.

Welcome to the Black Mesa forums trytobehappy. We aren’t all a bunch of cyber-police around here. Do you have a specific question about how to implement any of these possible fixes?

item.title: Half Life 2 + Windows 7 = FAILS
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
this is strange.

today, after updating windows and rebooting, I opened up steam and i thought, “hey, I’ll give it another shot”. opened up steam, erased the launch options and started a new game…

and now it works perfectly. dont know why though, the windows update had nothing to do with drivers or anything like it, but now the glitch is gone.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 + Windows 7 = FAILS
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
acade365:

Hey! I finally got it to work!

I added the following parameters:

+mat_forcehardwaresync 0 +snd_async_prefetch_priority 1 +dxlevel 80

It has worked flawlessly since (I only tested it til route canal).

If you want more effects, try dxlevel 81, better normalmaps and much better water textures.

Keep in mind the dxlevel switch will always reset your resolution, to avoid manually setting it every time you start hl2 you could add -width and -height commands with your resolution (example -width 1280 -height 1024)

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 + Windows 7 = FAILS
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
wow, halflife hates your video card, that long string of launch options is like a restraining order.

half lifes lawyer: Ok, I got thru the UAC but there are some restrictions, you cant use intels hardware synk, you must keep your priorities in order, and absolutely under no circumstances any direct x over 8.0

Read full topic
